summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackA fan-favorite, Farmacy's Honey Halo Ultra-Hydrating Ceramide Moisturizer is clinically proven to visibly plump, improve the look of fine lines and replenish dry, distressed skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsPlumps skinHydrates + soothesKey IngredientsPotent Ceramide Blend: replenishes skin’s moisture barrier, helps smooth the look of wrinkles and boosts elasticityBuckwheat Honey with Propolis and Royal Jelly Blend: provides long-lasting moisture and antioxidants while soothing and hydratingFig Fruit Extract and Osmolytes: bind and restore moisture, leaving skin looking plump and suppleResearch Results8x increase in moisturization after 1 use*4x improvement in skin barrier function after 8 hours*100% had improved hydration after 1 use and 8 hours**Based on instrumental clinical testingItem 2635153How To UseUse in the morning and at nightApply to a clean faceAvoid direct contact with eyesIngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Butyrospermumparkii (Shea) Butter,Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C13-15 Alkane, Cetearyl Alcohol,Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Bis-Diglycerylpolyacyladipate-1, Diisostearyl Malate,Xylitylglucoside,Honeyextract/ Mel/ Extraitde Miel,Betaine, Panthenol, Hydrogenatedrapeseed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oilunsaponifiables, Ceramide Np, Propolis Extract, Royal Jellyextract, Tocopherol,Ficus Carica (Fig)Fruit Extract, Hippophaerhamnoides Oil,Glucose, Bisabolol,Xylitol, Anhydroxylitol,Cetearyl Glucoside,Triolein, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylatecrosspolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Arginine, Flavor (Aroma)*,Hydroxyacetophenone,Xanthan Gum, Glyceryldioleate, Sodiumdilauramidoglutamidelysine, Sodium Phytate, Sorbitanisostearate, Citricacid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate (*Natural Flavor /Arome Naturel).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use in the morning and at nightApply to a clean faceAvoid direct contact with eyes

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: Love this

reviews.headline: I LOVE THIS MOISTURIZER!!
reviews.comments: I love the way this moisturizer makes me skin look and feel! From the way it smells, to the way it makes such a difference in my skin. I read reviews that people didn't like the jar, I love the jar! It's like a honeycomb, makes it easy to open, because you can grab onto it and it doesn't move, just the lid, and love the magnetic spatula! GOODBYE TATCHA!

reviews.headline: Instant breakouts and clogged pores
reviews.comments: I really wanted to love this moisturizer. It smells great and has a lovely texture, and I'm a sucker for anything with honey in it. But every time I use it, I get pimples and visibly clogged pores the next day. I'll use it once, stop for a few weeks, then try again, and the same thing happens every time. I can't figure out what ingredient(s) is causing the problem, as none of them stand out as typical pore-cloggers. So disappointed. Beware if you are at all acne-prone.

reviews.headline: Favorite day time moisturizer
reviews.comments: Works well under makeup and melts into the skin. I purchased a sample kit with this moisturizer and just bought the full size as I never want to run out. After two weeks, skin looks plumper and texture has improved.

reviews.headline: Love, love, love.
reviews.comments:
This is for the review readers like myself who cant try something new without reading reviews first. Try it. 
This calms and soothes my skin like nothing ive ever experienced.

reviews.headline: Obsessed with my holy grail
reviews.comments: I've been looking for so long for my perfect moisturizer. this is it for me. Soaks in beautifully for me. does not break me out, which has been a common problem with moisturizers for me, especially if my skin thinks i used too much. I just love this stuff, it just works for me. I have never looked forward to my moisturizer but I do with this. I bought about 6 months ago and held off to see if my ardor would fade. it has not. worth the money for my now on the dry side perimenopausal skin.❤️

reviews.headline: The Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I think that there are a lot of high quality skincare products at more affordable price points. That said, this moisturizer is worth every penny! I typically have dry skin that gets more oily during my cycle, and it works SO well no matter what state my skin is in. It's creamy and dewy without being too heavy. It gives all day hydration, and it even wears well under makeup. I've also had less acne flares since incorporating this product into my routine. I cant say enough great things about how amazing this product is and how much I love it!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Kept skin hydrated

reviews.headline: Worst product ever!
reviews.comments: This was the worst product I've ever used! I had to stop because it gave me perioral dermatitis around my mouth and I've never had it before until I started using this product. Buyer be warned!

reviews.headline: Great Cream!
reviews.comments: Very moisturizing!

reviews.headline: greatly improved from the original
reviews.comments: The new version of their honey moisturizer is leagues better than the original. The original was so sticky and difficult to apply whereas this one is an actual lotion that applies easily and smoothly. The scent is lightly of honey, and the application feels a bit sticky to the touch afterwards, but not in a bad way. My skin definitely feels hydrated after applying it, and a little goes a long way. I do feel it is on the richer side though, so I'm not able to use this daily with my oily skin type.

reviews.headline: Skin Reaction
reviews.comments:
I really wanted to love this product but my skin unfortuantely had a reaction. The first week it was great! Super mousturizing and didn't make me look greasy at all. But unfortuantely my skin type didn't react well over time. I have extremely sensitive skin and I also have PCOS so when I went through the first week I started getting a rash just along my smile lines to my nose. I thought maybe it'd clear up the more I got used to it but it got worse. It eventually turned into acne and super dry and patchy where it reacted. Once I stopped using it and went back to my old mousturizer it cleared up. 
I know it works for a lot of people but for those that might have super sensitive skin or PCOS, keep in mind it might create a reaction. Otherwise in the areas that didn't get affected it is super moistizing and smells great. I wish my skin type didn't react so badly, otherwise I'd say it's a great product.

reviews.headline: So good for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I rarely write reviews for anything, but this moisturizer has calmed my skin immensely. I bought this as an attempt to find something cheaper than Tatcha, which I've used for years now. Imagine my surprise when this was not only cheaper but BETTER. My redness was immediately reduced after beginning, and after continued use its only improved. My skin looks so good, I won't be going back to Tatcha!

reviews.headline: GLOWING SKIN
reviews.comments: never had a moisturizer give me literal glowy skin. If you're skin looks dull, this will transform it INSTANTLY! and you'll glow all day! No greasy feeling after use love that.

reviews.headline: GLOWING SKIN
reviews.comments: never had a moisturizer give me literal glowy skin. If you're skin looks dull, this will transform it INSTANTLY! and you'll glow all day! No greasy feeling after use love that.

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer
reviews.comments: I have rebought this product so many times. I love it .

reviews.headline: Nice moisturizer
reviews.comments: I've purchased this several times and am always pleased with the quality.  I just wish it was a little more moisturizing on my aging skin.

reviews.headline: I love this moisturizer
reviews.comments: It smells amazing, and feels instantly hydrating on the skin. My favorite moisturizer, i just wish it wasnt so expensive. A bottle lasts me a little over 2 months

reviews.headline: I'm looking forward to using this again in the morning!
reviews.comments: I've never actively pursued a product to write a positive review, but here I am! Recommended by an Ulta employee today and I'm using this lotion for the first time tonight.  I've never felt my skin drink up a moisturizer…until just now.  I put extra on twice because it just felt so immensely hydrating and great on my skin.  I swear my wrinkles just plumped out.  I'm looking forward  to using this again in the morning!

reviews.headline: My New Favorite
reviews.comments: I have tried a few affordable moisturizers lately and this one I keep coming back too!! A little goes a lont way! Ir smells lightly of honey and moisturizers very well. Makeup looks great also after using.

media.headline: Last face cream I'll ever buy!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have highly reactive, combination, oily skin, and finding a face cream that hydrates without triggering breakouts or leaving my skin feeling too dry or excessively oily has been a challenge. This is particularly important during the winter months when my skin tends to become drier, yet I still need to be cautious of products that can make it greasy throughout the day. This cream has been a fantastic solution. It's truly a game-changer! With a delightful honey scent, it absorbs wonderfully and keeps my skin hydrated and radiant without any greasy residue. What sets this cream apart from others is its deep moisturizing properties. In the summer, it might feel a bit heavy for my skin type, but I notice that my skin's needs shift with the changing seasons. Another major plus is that this lotion doesn't pill, which has been a significant issue for me in the past. It layers beautifully under makeup, although I primarily use it as my night cream or on days when I'm keeping my makeup minimal. The jar's design is incredibly smart, featuring a magnetized applicator and lid that stay together, so you won't have to search for the little stick or keep everything in the original box to avoid losing it.  Complimentary from farmacybeauty.
faceoff_positive.headline: Deeply moisturizing on combination skin

faceoff_negative.comments:
I really wanted to love this product but my skin unfortuantely had a reaction. The first week it was great! Super mousturizing and didn't make me look greasy at all. But unfortuantely my skin type didn't react well over time. I have extremely sensitive skin and I also have PCOS so when I went through the first week I started getting a rash just along my smile lines to my nose. I thought maybe it'd clear up the more I got used to it but it got worse. It eventually turned into acne and super dry and patchy where it reacted. Once I stopped using it and went back to my old mousturizer it cleared up. 
I know it works for a lot of people but for those that might have super sensitive skin or PCOS, keep in mind it might create a reaction. Otherwise in the areas that didn't get affected it is super moistizing and smells great. I wish my skin type didn't react so badly, otherwise I'd say it's a great product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Skin Reaction
